New Records: Ja Morant recorded his 60th career point-assist double-double, tying the @memgrizz franchise record also held by Mike Conley.
Pre-Game Insights: Ja Morant was listed as questionable on the injury report entering the game with right thigh soreness.
Post-Match Reflections: The Memphis Grizzlies improved to 2-1 on the NBA season with their win over the Orlando Magic.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies will host the Chicago Bulls on Monday night in their next game, as they look to move to 3-1 on the season.
Others: Ja Morant tallied 16 points and 10 assists in the win, despite missing all six of his three-pointers.
